AzureBlade: Let me go, then shut down and pretend I beat you bad. 
Simple, isn't it?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> StarStorm:
> 
> "COOL" said with sarcasm the femme"If I destroy your body, you 
> posses mine, If I let you go, Hydras will destroy me... I loose 
> whatever I choose... Nowhow can I choose one and don't loose, you 
> tell me?"
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > AzureBlade: I am AzureBlade, also known as Protoform Z, brother 
of 
> > Protoform X, Rampage. I am half Maximal and half Predacon. I 
won't 
> > lie to you. You let me go unharmed or I possess you. Either way 
is 
> > fine for me, but one is less practical. As for you, one of those 
> way 
> > is... let's say less pleasant.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > Starstor:
> > > 
> > > "How I could know that you aren't lieing me... you treacharous 
> > > bot?"replied cooled the femme
> > > 
> > >

> > > > AzureBlade looked straight in the optics of his enemy.
> > > > 
> > > > AzureBlade: My spark is undying, unless it comes into contact 
> > with

> > > >
